details.description:
Spacious new development in prime Bushwick!
Incredible 2 bedroom 1 bath with all the bells and whistles. Great shared backyard space! Laundry in the unit, dishwasher, and central AC. Top of the line stainless steel appliances. Each bedroom is on the opposite side for ultimate privacy, with a big living room/kitchen area in between. The exposed brick and beams add a dynamic element to the apartment.
The building features a gorgeous roof deck with skyline views, and comfy patio furniture for your enjoyment. Storage in the basement.
Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains just 1 block away. Surrounded by top rated restaurants and bars - Dromedary Tiki Bar, Milk; Pull Coffee, L'imprimerie Bakery, Boobie Trap Bar, Bushwick Burger Co, Williamsburg Pizza, and many more.
Small pets welcome No broker fee Available April 1st

amenities.pets: Small pets allowed, All pets allowed
amenities.other: Central A/C, Hardwood Floors, Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen, separate living room with natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, and renovated bathroom.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first; security Heat; hot water included NO BROKER FEE

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances

details.description:
MySpace exclusive!
Spacious one bedroom in well maintained pre war building in Williamsburg. Large living room perfect for entertaining. Updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Short walk to the J,M,G and L trains. Super easy to get anywhere! Pies-n-Thighs, The Rosemont, Testo, Align Coffee, Williamsburg Pizza, Modern Love Vega, etc all nearby. Incredible Williamsburg location.
Available 5/1 Small pets OK No broker fee

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances

details.description:
Myspace Exclusive!
This must see 1br apartment has a massive living room, an updated kitchen with great cabinet space and stainless still appliances, multiple closets and hardwood floors throughout.
Laundromat is available just outside the building Heat and hot water included
Small pets OK Available 5/1

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors

details.description: Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building - Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

details.description:
Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom(s), stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby's All Right, Patrizia's, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom(s), stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby's All Right, Patrizia's, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

details.description:
BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING in the beautiful Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO!! Enjoy unbelievable views across both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Visit the countless parks nearby such as John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park and even more! Become a patron of some of the long standing and delicious LOCAL local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee and still enjoy those late night cravings spots we pretend we don't know and love (*cough Shake Shack) just a few blocks further. Take a little old school Brooklyn, mix in some new luxury living, and that's how you'll end up falling in love with your new home here!
Conveniently located off the A, C and F trains as well as the B57, B62, B69 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher; Microwave Central A/C; Heat Inquire for Private Balconies! Inquire for IN UNIT laundry!
BUILDING FEATURES: Courtyard Roof Deck Elevator Laundry Room Fitness Center Rec Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Bike Storage Pets Allowed
First; Security NO BROKER FEE!

amenities.other: Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
Easily practice safe social distancing with your own?Private. Unobstructed. Views. Of Manhattan. Built-in 2019, You?ll enjoy a generously-spaced 3-bed option, in the beautiful neighborhood of Astoria, yeah, green space and good bites, for days!
You?ll enjoy a super sun-lit 3 bedroom unit that can each room comfortably fit a queen-sized bed, dresser, tall wardrobe, make it your studio or even home gym or playroom for a little-one.
Make dinner without, having to clear your workspace all the time, and having a pet to help keep you company! After dinner, take a stroll through the neighborhood and check out everything.
Lucky for you you?re nestled on a residential block, close to shops, stores, and Transportation options are the N/Q at Broadway, and R/M at Steinway, an estimated 20 min. to Midtown? for those who commute.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Private Outdoor Space

details.description:
The perfect spot for a central Williamsburg vibe in a slightly quieter area! Don't worry though, that busy waterfront is only a short walk away :) Find all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. East Williamsburg is still an amazing, diverse, and community-centered neighborhood with great accessibility to almost any other Brooklyn area and a very easy commute to Manhattan. Conveniently located off the L, J. M, and G trains, as well as the B43, B46, B48, and B60 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat
BUILDING FEATURES: Laundry Room Finished Roof Deck

amenities.other: Central A/C, Hardwood Floors

details.description:
NOW WITH NO BROKER FEE!!
The Kent House is in arguably THE MOST desirable neighborhood in Brooklyn. Right on the Williamsburg Waterfront with gorgeous river and city views, all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door.
Conveniently located off the J. M, and L trains, as well as the B32, B62, and Q59 bus routes.

details.description: Introducing 581 Ocean, located in Kensington, alongside historical Ocean Parkway. 581 Ocean is a brand new luxury building offering 60 rental units.All units feature oversized windows, high-end modern appliances, gorgeous hardwood floors, and tasteful finishes throughout. Select units provide spacious balconies, patios, or private backyard spaces.Amenities include an elevator, lounge, gym, laundry room, bike storage, and parking garage.deally located on Ocean Parkway and 18th Avenue, you?ll have easy access to the B and Q trains at Newkirk Plaza as well as the F train at 18th Avenue and Ditmas Avenue stations. Prospect Park is just a 10 minute bike ride away.Make sure to enjoy all the diverse culture and dining this neighborhood has to offer.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space

details.description:
Step into the epitome of modern living at 1359 Nostrand Ave! With meticulously designed units and a wealth of building amenities, paired with easy access to transportation options, this is urban living at its finest.
The Units:
Thoughtfully designed layouts featuring hardwood floors throughout. Split A/C units for climate control. Stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and studio penthouse options available. Building Amenities:
Shared roof-deck with panoramic views. Secure bike room. Virtual doorman system. Laundry facilities.
Transportation:
Convenient access to multiple transportation options, including the 2/5/B/Q trains. This breakdown offers a clear and concise overview of the amenities available both within the units and throughout the building, as well as highlighting the transportation options in the vicinity.

amenities.other: Dishwasher
Duplex, Backyard, Central A/C, Dishwasher

details.description:
Gorgeous 2 bedroom 2 bath with private terrace!
Incredible luxury doorman building. Large living room and private outdoor space! Large bedrooms with lots of closets and storage. Stainless steel kitchen with dishwasher and microwave. Oak wood floors. One fully tiled bathroom with a large soaking tub. Central air and central heating. Laundry in unit!Building features media room, Gym with a sauna, recreational room featuring a pool table, ping pong table, air hockey. Bike storage.An amazing roof with great views of the city.Garage. Near the Shuttle,2,3,4,5 and C trains. Near Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, Bergen Beer Garden and Franklin Ave trendy restaurants and bars.
October 1st move in

amenities.other: Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Private Outdoor Space

details.description:
Ultimate luxury living in this converted historic landmarked movie theater in Ridgewood!
2 bedroom, 1.5 bath. Fully equipped building featuring a gym, elevator, laundry room, pet spa, business conference center, and kid?s room. Fully furnished patio with bbq and hammocks, and roof deck with skyline views.
The apartments have central AC, dishwashers, and plenty of storage. Top of the line appliances and finishes.
Truly breathtaking building.
Available now Pets OK No broker fee

details.description: Virtual tours available!Do not miss out on this 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhood's easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Virtual tours available!
Act fast on this fantastic 2BR 1baths apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Flatbush-East Flatbush! Explore some of Brooklyn's best architecture with various styles of homes. Surrounded by a number of cool cafes, grocery stores, local restaurants, 2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Quick commute to Atlantic terminal with endless transportation options! Take a stroll to your near by Avenues like Flatbush Ave, Rogers Ave, and Nostrand Ave that are loaded with trendy, new small business and more!

details.description: Beautiful 2BR/1bath apartment in East Williamsburg Prime location Massive bedrooms Corner unit with lots of windows for sunlight Central air Dishwasher No broker fee High ceilings Spacious living room Queen-sized bedrooms Stainless steel kitchen Modern bathroom Hardwood floors Lots of natural light from windows

This cozy apartment is located on the first floor of a well-maintained building in the bustling neighborhood of Prospect Lefferts Gardens, Brooklyn. The unit has 2 bedroom and 2 bathroom Duplex w/ private balcony , with hardwood floors throughout and large windows that let in plenty of natural light.
The living and dining area is cozy and offers a comfortable space for relaxing and entertaining. The kitchen features modern appliances, including a gas stove, refrigerator, and microwave, and has ample counter space and storage.
The bedroom is spacious and can accommodate a variety of furniture arrangements. The bathroom has been updated with new fixtures and finishes.
The building is conveniently located near several subway lines, including the 2, 5, and B, providing easy access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn. There are also many restaurants, bars, and shops in the area, making it a great neighborhood for those who love to explore.

amenities.other: Duplex
